T02D2535:6b-4: gzhi dang rten gyi 'khor lo rnams la dbyangs dang

T02D2535:6b-11: to // sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //

T02D2535:6b-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02D2535:6b-14: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2535:6b-15: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog gi bar gyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02D2535:6b-16: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
T02D2535:6b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
T02D2535:6b-18: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal gyi bar gyis
T02D2535:6b-19: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor bstan to
T02D2535:6b-20: // gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston //
T02D2535:6b-21: nor bu chen po rin chen tog gi bar gyis ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02D2535:6b-22: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
T02D2535:6b-23: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog gi bar gyis ni rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bstan to //

T02D2535:6b-25: bcas pa bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi dbang du mdzad

T02D2535:6b-28: ji lta bar rang rang gi sa bon rnams aa
T02D2535:6b-29: nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs pas aa las byung ba
T02D2535:6b-30: dang / aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces gsungs so //

T02D2535:6b-35: khong nas 'byung ba ni khyab pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2535:7a-0: gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa sku @7a

T02D2535:7a-10: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D2535:7a-11: 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa rdo

T02D2535:7a-13: dril bu bsnams pa ste rig pa'i lha mo rnams

T02D2535:7a-16: des na sems can dbugs 'byin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /

T02D2535:7a-18: chags rnam par dag pa ni 'od dpag tu med

T02D2535:7a-21: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
T02D2535:7a-23: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'o //

T02D2535:7a-31: khro ba chen po sgra che ba ste phrag dog rnam par dag pa don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2535:7a-32: 'jig rten pa'i chags pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir chags pa che ba'o //
T02D2535:7a-34: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //

T02D2535:11b-22: nas kun 'dren zhing mi gtong bas na ngan song
T02D2535:11b-23: kun no // rnam par mi rtog pa ni mya ngan dang mun pa med pa'o //
T02D2535:11b-24: dbyings mi zad pa ni nges par 'joms pa'o //
T02D2535:11b-25: chos kyi dbyings dam pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing
T02D2535:11b-26: zad mi shes pa'i 'od mnga' bas na dra ba
T02D2535:11b-28: bsod nams dang ldan pa'i zla bas sems can tshim
T02D2535:11b-29: zhing bsod nams mchog gi sku gzhon nu mnga' bas
T02D2535:11b-31: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'od do //
T02D2535:11b-32: ye shes 'byung gnas che ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2535:11b-33: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes ;
T02D2535:11b-34: / zhes bya ba ni yod med la khyab pa'i
T02D2535:11b-35: ye shes dang ldan pa'i skye gnas mnga' bas na
T02D2535:11b-37: tshogs gnyis bsags pas tshogs gnyis kyi mthus sgrib pa thams cad sel bas na sgrib pa sel ba'o //
T02D2535:12a-0: rtag pa kun rgyal zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su @12a * //
T02D2535:12a-1: bcad pa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bstan te /
T02D2535:12a-2: rtag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2535:12a-3: kun rgyal ni me long lta bu'o //
T02D2535:12a-4: rnal 'byor can ni mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2535:12a-5: bsam gtan bsam bya ni bya ba nan tan to //
T02D2535:12a-6: blo ldan mchog ni so sor kun du rtog pa'o //
T02D2535:12a-7: so so rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02D2535:12a-8: mchog gi dang po zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D2535:12a-9: de la dkyil 'khor drug pa la dang po'i sangs rgyas yod pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2535:12a-10: de nyid ni dang po'i sangs rgyas te mchog gi dang po'o //
T02D2535:12a-11: so so rang rig ces bya ba ni ye shes
T02D2535:12a-12: sku ste de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang dang
T02D2535:12a-13: po'i sangs rgyas dang ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid
T02D2535:12a-14: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dang /
T02D2535:12a-15: sprul pa'i sku gsum 'chang bas sku gsum 'chang ba'o //
T02D2535:12a-16: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can ni rnam pa'i
T02D2535:12a-17: sgo nas me long lta bu'i ye shes te mi
T02D2535:12a-18: bskyod pa'o // khyab bdag ye shes lnga'i bdag ni
T02D2535:12a-19: ye shes sems dpa'i so sor rtog pas na 'od
T02D2535:12a-21: sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can ni bdag nyid
T02D2535:12a-22: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan 'chang ba'i rin chen 'byung
T02D2535:12a-23: ldan no // spyan sngar bya ba byas pa la chags pa med pas don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2535:12a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dkar po dang sngon
T02D2535:12a-25: po dang dmar po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i
T02D2535:12a-26: sku mdog can zhal lnga pa phyag brgyad pa thams
T02D2535:12a-27: cad kyang dang po na 'khor lo dang rdo rje
T02D2535:12a-28: dang padma dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D2535:12a-29: rje ba snams pa g-yas kyi tha ma gsum thams
T02D2535:12a-30: cad ral gri bsnams pa g-yon gyi dang po thams
T02D2535:12a-31: cad rang rang gi mtshan ma dril bu bsnams pa
T02D2535:12a-32: / g-yon lhag ma gsum pa thams cad glegs bam
T02D2535:12a-33: ba snams pa rnam par snang mdzad ni g-yas sngo
T02D2535:12a-34: ba rgyab dmar ba g-yon ljang ba steng ser ba'o
T02D2535:12a-35: / // mi bskyod pa ni g-yas dkar ba dang
T02D2535:12a-36: rgyab dmar ba g-yon ljang ba ste snga ma bzhin
T02D2535:12a-37: / // no // snang ba mtha' yas ni g-yas
T02D2535:12a-38: dkar ba rgyab sngo ba g-yon ljang ba ste snga
T02D2535:12a-39: / // no // ma bzhin no // rin chen
T02D2535:12a-40: 'byung ldan ni g-yas dkar ba rgyab dmar ba g-yon
T02D2535:12a-41: ljang ba ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2535:12a-42: don yod grub pa ni g-yas dkar ba rgyab dmar ba g-yon sngo ba ste ser ba'o //
T02D2535:12b-0: sangs rgyas @12b thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2535:12b-1: zhes tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad bstan te /
T02D2535:12b-2: thams cad gser gyi mdog can g-yas na 'khor lo
T02D2535:12b-3: bsnams pa g-yon gdan la brten pa seng ge'i steng
T02D2535:12b-4: na nyi ma la rdo rje skyil mo krung rin
T02D2535:12b-5: po cha'i cod pan can no //
T02D2535:12b-6: yang dag pa'i lta bas sangs rgyas thams cad skyed
T02D2535:12b-7: pas na dang po rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba'o
T02D2535:12b-8: // yang dag pa'i rtog pas sangs rgyas kyi sras
T02D2535:12b-9: po dam pa rnams skyed pas na mchog ste gnyis
T02D2535:12b-10: pa rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D2535:12b-11: yang dag pa'i ngag ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i
T02D2535:12b-12: bdag nyid shes rab sred par 'byung ba'i skye gnas
T02D2535:12b-13: med pas gsum pa padma'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D2535:12b-14: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' chos las byung ba'i
T02D2535:12b-15: lam gyi mya ngan las 'das pas srid pa sel
T02D2535:12b-16: bas na bzhi ba las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'o
T02D2535:12b-17: // yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas stong pa nyid la
T02D2535:12b-18: gcig tu mkhregs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi
T02D2535:12b-19: rdo rje'i bdag nyid lnga pa phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2535:12b-21: yang dag pa'i rtsol bas skyes ma thag tu skad
T02D2535:12b-22: cig ma la bya ba grub pa'i sprul pa 'gro
T02D2535:12b-23: ba'i bdag po drug pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
T02D2535:12b-25: yang dag pa'i dran pa nam mkha' las byung ba'i
T02D2535:12b-26: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas rang bzhin gyis
T02D2535:12b-27: 'od gsal ba'i me las byung ba'i bdun pa chos
T02D2535:12b-28: kyi phyag rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D2535:12b-29: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni lhag mthong shes
T02D2535:12b-30: rab ye shes kyi me chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2535:12b-31: la snyoms par zhugs pas nyon mongs pa dang shes
T02D2535:12b-32: bya'i sgrib pa sreg pa'i brgyad pa las kyi phyag
T02D2535:12b-34: 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs bzhir gnyis gnyis bzhugs la /
T02D2535:12b-35: mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa yum bzhi dgod par bya'o //
T02D2535:12b-36: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed ;
T02D2535:12b-37: / ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad bstan te /
T02D2535:12b-38: gzugs chen po'i 'od phun sum tshogs pa snad bar byed pa sgeg mo'o //
T02D2535:12b-39: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi ye
T02D2535:12b-40: shes snang bas lham mer mdzad pas na phreng ba
T02D2535:13a-1: 'gro ba mi 'khrugs pa'i bzed pa'i mar me ye shes kyi sgron ma glu ma'o //
T02D2535:13a-2: gzi brjid chen po'i go cha brtson 'grus kyi stobs
T02D2535:13a-3: kyis le lo'i gnyen por 'od gsal ba'i phyir na
T02D2535:13a-4: gar ma'o // zhi gnas kyi sngags kyis nyon mongs
T02D2535:13a-5: pa'i dug zhi par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal
T02D2535:13a-7: sngags kyi rgyal po shes rab kyis mya ngan las
T02D2535:13a-8: 'das pa'i don chen po byed pas me tog ma'o
T02D2535:13a-9: // gtsug tor chen po'i thabs dang stobs kyis rmad
T02D2535:13a-10: du byung ba'i zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i
T02D2535:13a-11: gtsug tor mnga' bas na dri chab ma'o //
T02D2535:13a-12: smon lam gyi stobs kyis gzugs sna tshogs ston pa
T02D2535:13a-13: dang ye shes kyi nam mkha'i bdag po mdzad pas
T02D2535:13a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku bsgom pa'i dad pa'i mchog
T02D2535:13a-16: ste rdo rje lcags kyu ni dkar po rdo rje
T02D2535:13a-18: kun du dga' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi mig dang ldan
T02D2535:13a-19: pas rdo rje zhags pa ni ser po zhags pa
T02D2535:13a-20: bsnams pa'o // sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can dran pa'i
T02D2535:13a-21: dbang pos 'gro ba la phan pa bskyed pa rdo
T02D2535:13a-23: shes rab kyi dbang pos mchod cing bstod de ting
T02D2535:13a-24: nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos drang srong chen por gyur
T02D2535:13a-25: pa ni rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu ste dril
T02D2535:13a-26: bu bsnams pa'o // shlo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum
T02D2535:13a-27: gyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan te
T02D2535:13a-28: bu bsnams pa'o // / shes rab ye shes lus
T02D2535:13a-29: 'chang ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor los
T02D2535:13a-31: / da ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas bstod par bzhed pas /
T02D2535:13a-32: rigs gsum 'chang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2535:13a-33: dang po'i tshigs bcad gcig gis rnam par snang mdzad ston pa la /
T02D2535:13a-34: rigs gsum 'chang ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi
T02D2535:13a-35: yin tan no / gsang sngags can ni don yod
T02D2535:13a-37: dam tshig chen po ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02D2535:13a-38: gsang sngags 'chang ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi'o //
T02D2535:13a-39: gtso bo ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D2535:13a-40: rang dang po'i sangs rgyas dang ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2535:13a-41: theg pa mchog gsum ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po gsum ston pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi @13b dbang du byas na /
T02D2535:13b-1: don yod zhags pa ni mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-2: rnam par rgyal ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D2535:13b-3: par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D2535:13b-4: 'dzin pa'o // 'dzin pa chen po ni ral gri'i yu ba 'dzin pas na ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-5: rdo rje zhags pa ni zhags ba nyid do //
T02D2535:13b-6: rdo rje lcags kyu ni lcags kyu nyid do //
T02D2535:13b-7: zhags pa chen po ni lcags sgrog go //
T02D2535:13b-8: rdo rje 'jigs byed ni dbang phyug chen pho dang au ma 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-9: rin chen h'um mdzad bshad pa ni /
T02D2535:13b-10: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs ni mdog ser po mig drug ni spyan drug tshan gsum mo //
T02D2535:13b-11: lag drug stobs dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten gsum
T02D2535:13b-12: las rgyal ba'i phyag rgya spangs pa'i snga ma drug
T02D2535:13b-13: go // padma h'um mdzad bshad pa ni /
T02D2535:13b-14: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po ste keng rus ltar mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-15: ha la ha la ni dug nag po brtsegs pas mgrin pa sngon po'o //
T02D2535:13b-16: gdong brgya pa ni sprul pa gdong brgya 'gyed pas
T02D2535:13b-17: kha dog dmar po rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgyas dril
T02D2535:13b-19: las kyi h'um mdzad bshad pa /
T02D2535:13b-20: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal te sku mdog
T02D2535:13b-21: ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams
T02D2535:13b-22: pa phyag lhag ma bzhi gshin rje dang mtshungs pa
T02D2535:13b-23: / ral gri dang gtun shing dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D2535:13b-24: rdo rje shugs can gyi phrin las rnam pa bzhis gzhan 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D2535:13b-25: rdo rje sems ma bshad pa rdo rje ni stong pa nyid yin la /
T02D2535:13b-26: grags pa ni snyan par grags pas na rdo rje sems ma'o //
T02D2535:13b-27: rdo rje ni mtshan ma med pa'o ;
T02D2535:13b-28: / snying po ni skye gnas te rdo rje rin chen ma'o //
T02D2535:13b-29: smon pa med pa'i sgyu 'phrul ni rdo rje chos ma'o //
T02D2535:13b-30: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba'i gsus ba che bas khyab pas na rdo rje las ma'o //
T02D2535:13b-31: rin chen h'um mdzad kyi 'khor gyi dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
T02D2535:13b-32: rdo rje las skyes ni mnyam pa nyid de rdo rje'i bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen no //
T02D2535:13b-33: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02D2535:13b-34: zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i 'od mnga' bas na rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D2535:13b-35: byams pa chen po mi g-yo ba'i khro bo'i ral
T02D2535:13b-36: pa gcig gis bsgyings pas na rdo rje rgyal mtshan
T02D2535:14a-0: no // chos kyi sbyin pas glang po che'i ko ba snying rjes brlan pas na @14a * //
T02D2535:14a-1: ngo tsha shes pa'i gos su mnabs shing so'i phreng ba 'chang ba'o //
T02D2535:14a-2: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi 'khor bshad pa /
T02D2535:14a-3: sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ha ha zhes sgrogs pa ni rdo rje las so //
T02D2535:14a-4: hi hi sgrogs shing 'jigs par byed pa brtson 'grus
T02D2535:14a-5: kyi go cha man bas pas na rdo rje srung
T02D2535:14a-6: ba'o // so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi /
T02D2535:14a-7: gad mo chen po'i gad rgyangs can ni rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2535:14a-8: sgrub pa nan tan gyi brtson 'grus kyi //
T02D2535:14a-9: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pas na rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2535:14a-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'khor bshad pa ni /
T02D2535:14a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2535:14a-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid do //
T02D2535:14a-13: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che ni rdo rje rgyal po nyid do //
T02D2535:14a-14: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che ni chags pa yin pas rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02D2535:14a-15: rdo rje spro ba ni h'um ste h'um gi sgra sgrogs pa ni rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2535:14a-16: chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi 'khor bshad pa ni /
T02D2535:14a-17: mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa ni padma'i mda' dang gzhu thogs pa'i rdo rje chos so //
T02D2535:14a-18: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2535:14a-19: rdo rje kun 'chang ni rdzu 'phrul gyis kun du
T02D2535:14a-20: spro ba'i rdo rje 'chang bas na rdo rje 'khor
T02D2535:14a-21: lo'o // rdo rje gcig pus lce la mtshan pa
T02D2535:14a-22: so so yang dag par rig pas pha rol gyi
T02D2535:14a-23: g-yul sel bas na rdo rje smra ba'o //
T02D2535:14a-24: rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar ba dang mig mi bzad pa 'chang bas na rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D2535:14a-25: skra yang rdo rje 'bar bas zhags pa'o //
T02D2535:14a-26: ting nge 'dzin gyi mig brgya mnga' zhing mngon par
T02D2535:14a-27: shes pa drug gi rdo rje'i mig mnga' bas na
T02D2535:14a-28: lcags sgrog go // rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o ;
T02D2535:14a-29: / las ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
T02D2535:14a-30: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis mchod pa'i lha mo ston te /
T02D2535:14a-31: sbyin pa la sbyor ba bstan pas rdo rje bzhin du /
T02D2535:14a-32: lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can ni sgeg mo'o //
T02D2535:14a-33: tshul khrims la sbyor ba mi phyed pas rdo rje'i
T02D2535:14a-34: ba spu ste gcig pu lus kyi phreng ba ma'o
T02D2535:14a-35: // bzod pa la mi phyed pas na sen mo skyes pa rdo rje rdo rje glu ma'o //
T02D2535:14a-36: brtson 'grus la mi phyed pa'i sbyor ba /
T02D2535:14a-37: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs te rdo rje gar ma'o //
T02D2535:14a-38: zhi gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rdo rje phreng ba
T02D2535:14a-39: thogs shing zung du 'jug pa'i dpal dang ldan pas
T02D2535:14b-0: bdug pa'o // lhag mthong 'ba' zhig gi rgyan @14b gyis brgyan pas na me tog ma'o //
T02D2535:14b-1: stobs ston pa'i gad rgyangs nges par sgrogs pas na rdo rje mar me ma'o //
T02D2535:14b-2: mi phyed pa'i smon lam gyi rdo rje sgra 'byin cing aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2535:14b-3: rdo rje sgra 'don pas na rdo rje dri chab ma'o //
T02D2535:14b-4: bskal pa bzang po'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D2535:14b-5: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra chen po ste shar phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2535:14b-6: spobs pas 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig sgrogs pa ste /
T02D2535:14b-7: spobs pa brtsegs pas lho phyogs mtshon pa'o //
T02D2535:14b-8: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa ni rdo rje
T02D2535:14b-9: snying po nyid de byang phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o
T02D2535:14b-10: // sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni mya
T02D2535:14b-11: ngan dang mun ba'i dgra 'joms pa'i mchog ni mya
T02D2535:14b-12: ngan dang mun pa sel bar 'joms pa ste nub
T02D2535:14b-14: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis khams
T02D2535:14b-15: gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bstan pa'i
T02D2535:14b-16: 'khor los sgyur ba ni sdug bsngal gcod pa dang
T02D2535:14b-18: / da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil
T02D2535:14b-19: 'khor la 'jug pa ni rig pa'i lha mo la
T02D2535:14b-21: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid de chos bdag med pa nyid dang /
T02D2535:14b-22: yang dag mtha' ste gang zag gi bdag med pa
T02D2535:14b-23: la yi ges brjod du med pa ni padma rigs
T02D2535:14b-25: mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste /
T02D2535:14b-26: snying rjes zab pa dang rgya che ba sgra sgrogs pas na padma'i rigs chen mo'o //
T02D2535:14b-27: smon pa med pa'i dang por dge ba'i chos kyi
T02D2535:14b-28: dung gi sgra chen ldan pa dang tha mar dge
T02D2535:14b-29: ba'i sgra chen dang ldan pa ste rdo rje chos
T02D2535:14b-30: ma'o // 'od gsal ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan
T02D2535:14b-31: las 'das pa'i phyogs bcur brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi
T02D2535:14b-32: rda bo che brdungs pas na chos kyi las ma'o
T02D2535:14b-33: ma'o // // mchod pa'i las ma rnams bshad pa /
T02D2535:14b-34: don dam par gzugs med cing kun rdzob tu sbyin pa'i gzugs dam pa ste /
T02D2535:14b-35: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yid las skyes pas na padma'i sgeg mo'o //
T02D2535:14b-36: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i gzugs snang ba'i dpal du
T02D2535:14b-37: gyur cing phred ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi don du ma
T02D2535:14b-38: lus 'chang bas na padma'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2535:15a-0: khros pas gzhan gyi don mi 'jigs pa'i 'od zer gyis tshugs pa @15a * //
T02D2535:15a-1: med cing cher grags pa'i bzod pa khams gsum gyi 'khor gyi sa bskor ba'o //
T02D2535:15a-2: che ba'i che bas na padma'i glu ma'o //
T02D2535:15a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni shin tu mtho ba
T02D2535:15a-4: la gnas shing dar ba chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi
T02D2535:15a-5: stobs bsnyems pas na padma'i gar ma'o //
T02D2535:15a-6: 'jig rten du gzhon nu'i lus bzung nas yon tan
T02D2535:15a-7: phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam gtan yun ring po'i gnyen
T02D2535:15a-8: po'i skye dgu'i bdag po ni padma'i bdug pa ma'o
T02D2535:15a-9: // shes rab kyi stobs kyis 'khor ba'i nyes pas
T02D2535:15a-10: ma gos shing lhag mthong gis mi zad pas na
T02D2535:15a-11: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan 'chang bas na padma'i
T02D2535:15a-12: // me tog ma'o // ye shes dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis //
T02D2535:15a-13: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02D2535:15a-14: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba'i slob dpon 'jigs pa med pa ni padma'i mar me ma'o //
T02D2535:15a-15: thams cad kyi mgon pos skyob cing 'jig rten gsum na yid gcugs pas /
T02D2535:15a-16: 'das pa bskyabs pa dang da ltar bskyabs nas ma
T02D2535:15a-17: 'ongs pa skyob pas na bla na med pa ste
T02D2535:15a-18: padma'i dri ma'o // rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang
T02D2535:15a-19: du mdzad nas ye shes rnams la chags pa dang
T02D2535:15a-20: thogs pa mi mnga' zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i dri
T02D2535:15a-21: ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyi
T02D2535:15a-22: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing /
T02D2535:15a-23: kun gyi srid pa'i dra ba bcom nas gzhan gyi
T02D2535:15a-24: rgyud nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar mdzad
T02D2535:15a-25: cing 'bras bu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu
T02D2535:15a-26: phyin nas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D2535:15a-27: pa'i ye shes dbang bskur cod pan ni rin po
T02D2535:15a-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ni sangs
T02D2535:15a-30: rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi do shal mnga' ba
T02D2535:15a-32: snying rjes 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang /
T02D2535:15a-34: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad cing byams
T02D2535:15a-35: pas khams gsum gyi sgrib pa bsal nas theg pa
T02D2535:15a-36: gsum gyis rnam par grol ba thob pa klu shing
T02D2535:15a-38: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol ba'i ral gri
T02D2535:15a-39: bsnams shing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i po ti bsnams
T02D2535:15a-41: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun las 'das pa'i dung
T02D2535:15b-0: bsnams shing kun rdzob @15b kyi dus gsum don dam
T02D2535:15b-1: par dus med par rtogs pa'i chu bsnams pa ni
T02D2535:15b-3: sems can rnams kyi nang na ye shes kyi gtso
T02D2535:15b-4: bo yon tan thod can rnams kyi cod pan me
T02D2535:15b-5: tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsnams pa ni
T02D2535:15b-7: nyon mongs pa'i lus kun las rnam par grol zhing
T02D2535:15b-8: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gter gyi mdzod phyag na
T02D2535:15b-9: bsnams pa ni bzang skyong ngo //
T02D2535:15b-10: yid bzhin nor bu 'chang zhing sems can kun la
T02D2535:15b-11: khyab pas rin po che'i mdzod ster bas blo gros
T02D2535:15b-12: rgya mtsho'o // dpag bsam gyi shing dang bum pa
T02D2535:15b-13: bzang po phyag na bsnams pas blo gros mi zad
T02D2535:15b-14: rgya mtsho'o // pa'o // so sor rtog pa'i byed
T02D2535:15b-15: pas sems can kun gyi don byed pa'i padma dang
T02D2535:15b-16: phan 'dogs pa'i po ti bsnams pas /
T02D2535:15b-17: sems can gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te spobs pa brtsegs pa'o //
T02D2535:15b-18: las rgyu 'bras bzang ngan shes shing sems can 'dul
T02D2535:15b-19: ba'i dus shes pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i dam
T02D2535:15b-20: tshig shes pa'i ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'i dam
T02D2535:15b-21: tshig dang ldan pa ni mthu chen thob pa'o //
T02D2535:15b-22: dus gsum mkhyen cing 'dul ba'i sems can gyi dbang
T02D2535:15b-23: po rab 'bring shes shing theg pa gsum gyis rnam
T02D2535:15b-24: par grol ba la mkhas pa'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa
T02D2535:15b-26: rang nyid yon tan dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi yon
T02D2535:15b-27: tan shes shing mya ngan dang bral ba'i chos shes
T02D2535:15b-28: pa'i bkra shis las byung ba'i dpal gyi be'u phyag
T02D2535:15b-29: na bsnams pa ni mya ngan dang mun pa nges
T02D2535:15b-31: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa ni g-yung drung 'khyil pa phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D2535:15b-32: sems can la phan pa'i grags pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs
T02D2535:15b-33: pa'i bkra shis dang sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i snyan
T02D2535:15b-34: grags dge ste dra ba can gyi 'od do //
T02D2535:15b-35: phyir mi ldog pas na dbugs 'byin chen po ste /
T02D2535:15b-36: sems can rnams dga' bar byed pas na dga' ston che ste /
T02D2535:15b-37: zla bas mtshan pa'i gdugs kyi rol mo chen po 'chang bas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
T02D2535:15b-38: so sor rtog pa'i bkur sti dang rim gro phun
T02D2535:15b-39: sum tshogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa mnga' zhing
T02D2535:15b-40: mchog tu dga' ba'i padma'i steng na grags pa'i bdag
T02D2535:15b-41: nyid kyi dpal gyi ral gri bsnams pa ni 'od
T02D2535:16a-1: mdzod mchog dang ldan zhing rin po che'i mdzod kyi mchog phyag na bsnams pa'i gtso bo ste /
T02D2535:16a-2: skyabs rnams kyi mchog nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2535:16a-3: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad ni dgra ste /
T02D2535:16a-4: de skyob ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje rab kyi mchog
T02D2535:16a-5: dang 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'i ral gri phyag
T02D2535:16a-6: na bsnams pa ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o
T02D2535:16a-7: // mi bskyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas tshigs su bcad pa drug ste /
T02D2535:16a-9: gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can gyi rma bya'i mdongs bzhin du dbu lcang lo bcings pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-10: munydzas bcings pa'i ral pa'i cod pan ni gdong lnga
T02D2535:16a-11: gtsug phud lnga dang ldan ni gdong lnga la cod
T02D2535:16a-12: pa na nyi shu mnga' ba'o //
T02D2535:16a-13: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod ni cod pan gyi bar nas me tog phreng ba'o //
T02D2535:16a-14: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
T02D2535:16a-15: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog ni zhal steng ma rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can no //
T02D2535:16a-16: de ltar zhal lnga ni ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-17: sems can la phan pa'i smon lam mthar phyin cing
T02D2535:16a-18: 'khor ba ji srid par dam bcas pas na dka'
T02D2535:16a-19: thub che ba'o // zhal steng ma de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2535:16a-20: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-21: bram ze tshangs pa ni lam gzhan las bstod pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-22: tshangs pa shes ni lam mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-23: mya ngan 'das pa thob pa ni slob pa'i lam me long lta bu thob pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-24: grol ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lags so //
T02D2535:16a-25: rnam par grol ba'i lus ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las so ;
T02D2535:16a-26: / grol ba ni nyan thos kyi'o //
T02D2535:16a-27: zhi ba theg pa chen po ste de'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2535:16a-28: mya ngan 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las so //
T02D2535:16a-29: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las so //
T02D2535:16a-31: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes rab kyis so //
T02D2535:16a-32: nye ba ni rab tu mi gnas pa la nye ba'o //
T02D2535:16a-33: bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa ni srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'o //
T02D2535:16a-34: chags bral ni sgrib pa las so //
T02D2535:16a-35: lus las 'das pa ni bag la nyal ba spangs pa ste rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2535:16a-36: thub pa med pa ni ser sna spangs pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-0: dpe med pa ni 'chal pa'i tshul @16b khrims spangs pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-1: mi mngon pa ni khong khro ba spangs pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-2: mi snang ba ni le lo dang bral ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-3: gsal byed min ni g-yeng pa med pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-4: mi 'gyur pa ni 'chal ba'i shes rab dang bral ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-5: theg pa gsum 'gro ba la smin cing grol ba la khyab pa po ste /
T02D2535:16b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis mdangs phra zhing
T02D2535:16b-7: zag pa sa bon dang bral ba ni rdo rje
T02D2535:16b-8: chags pa'o // rdul med ni sbyin pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-9: rdul bral ni tshul khrims so //
T02D2535:16b-10: dri ma med pa ni bzod pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-11: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
T02D2535:16b-12: rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2535:16b-13: shin tu sad par byed pas na bsam gtan no
T02D2535:16b-14: // ji snyed pa kun shes shing ji lta ba
T02D2535:16b-15: kun rig mnga' ba ni shes rab dam pa ste
T02D2535:16b-16: // / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ste rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-17: rin chen gtsug tor gyi dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
T02D2535:16b-18: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
T02D2535:16b-19: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gnas 'gyur ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-20: gnyis med ye shes tshul 'chang ba ni zung 'jug gi'o //
T02D2535:16b-21: rnam par mi rtog lhun gyis grub ni rin chen gtsug phud sku mdog ser po zhal lnga pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-22: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa ni da ltar
T02D2535:16b-23: gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rin chen gtsug phud
T02D2535:16b-24: dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kar bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2535:16b-25: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas w'a g'i shva ra'o //
T02D2535:16b-26: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D2535:16b-27: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa ni thugs kar zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-28: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2535:16b-29: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2535:16b-30: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i spyan gcig dang ldan pa'i w'a g'i shva ra'o //
T02D2535:16b-31: rdo rje bzhad pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:16b-32: tshig gi dbang phyug ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-33: smra ba chen po ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-34: smra ba'i skyes mchog ni yang dag pa'i ngag go //
T02D2535:16b-35: smra ba'i rgyal ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
T02D2535:16b-36: smra ba'i dam pa ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-37: mchog gi gnas ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
T02D2535:16b-38: smra ba'i seng ge ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-39: tshugs pa med pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2535:16b-40: rdo rje bzhad pa zhal bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D2535:16b-41: kun du lta ba ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o //
T02D2535:17a-1: tu dga' ba ni glang po'i 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-2: gzi brjid phreng ba ni me'i 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-3: lta na sdug pa ni sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-4: 'od 'bar ba ni mtshon gyi 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-5: dpal gyi be'u ni rkun mo'i 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-6: lag na 'od 'bar ba ni sha za'i 'jigs pa las so //
T02D2535:17a-7: snang ba po ni rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs kyi 'jigs
T02D2535:17a-8: pa las skyob pas na 'jig rten pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D2535:17a-9: brgyad skyob pa'o // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa ni /
T02D2535:17a-10: sman ba che mchog gtso bo ste //
T02D2535:17a-11: shes bya'i sgrib pa gso ba'o //
T02D2535:17a-12: nyon mongs pa'i zug rdu 'byin pa ste bla na med pa'o //
T02D2535:17a-13: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i bag la nyal ba ma lus pa 'joms pas na /
T02D2535:17a-14: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
T02D2535:17a-15: lam lnga'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spong bas na /
T02D2535:17a-16: nad do cog gi dgra che ba ste /
T02D2535:17a-17: lha nyi ma'i gzugs can no //
T02D2535:17a-18: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ni phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2535:17a-19: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2535:17a-20: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa //
T02D2535:17a-21: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni byams pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D2535:17a-22: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
T02D2535:17a-23: byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can ni snying rje dang byams ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2535:17a-24: dpal ldan ni zla ba'i gzugs can padma ni 'dir ku mu da ste steng na gar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2535:17a-25: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs ni phyag mtshan te zla ba'i rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2535:17a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan mnga' ba'o //
T02D2535:17a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba ni sku'i sgo nas so //
T02D2535:17a-28: rnal 'byor che ni thugs kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2535:17a-29: bstan pa gcig ni gsung gi sgo nas so //
T02D2535:17a-30: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so //
T02D2535:17a-31: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
T02D2535:17a-32: rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgo nas so //
T02D2535:17a-33: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag ni sems can kun la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2535:17a-34: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje ni de bzhin
T02D2535:17a-35: gshegs pa kun la dbang bskur ba'i bdag po ste
T02D2535:17b-0: snang ba mtha' yas padma'i ting nge @17b 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:17b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs la gnas pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
T02D2535:17b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
T02D2535:17b-5: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni rang nyid nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D2535:17b-6: rdo rje zla ba dri med ni dang po'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D2535:17b-7: chags bral ni mya ngan las 'das pa las so //
T02D2535:17b-8: sogs pas bsdus pa ni chags pa ste 'khor ba'o //
T02D2535:17b-9: chags pa ni gnyis ka la mi gnas pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-10: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba ni sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar ba'o //
T02D2535:17b-11: rdo rje skyil krung ni bzhugs stangs so //
T02D2535:17b-12: 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa ni padma bsnams pa ste /
T02D2535:17b-13: sems can la dmigs pa'i snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D2535:17b-15: sangs rgyas skyes ni snang ba mtha' yas las skyes pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-16: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni g-yon pas padma'i yu ba bzung nas g-yas pas 'byed pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-17: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni 'gro ba 'dul ba kun gzugs so //
T02D2535:17b-18: che ba sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas rig sngags
T02D2535:17b-19: kyi bdag po dbu la 'chang ba ste padma'i sgrol
T02D2535:17b-20: ma'o // rdo rje rnon po'i tshig bcad gcig ni go sla'o //
T02D2535:17b-21: khyab 'jug gi gzugs can rdo rje zab mo dzin
T02D2535:17b-22: dzik ste bla na med pa'i rgyal bas rgyal ba'o
T02D2535:17b-23: // rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-24: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa ni pha rol
T02D2535:17b-25: phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa'i sa bcu rdzogs pas na
T02D2535:17b-26: rgyan dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02D2535:17b-27: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-28: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang ni spobs pa'o //
T02D2535:17b-29: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni nges pa'i tshig go //
T02D2535:17b-30: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog ni don so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
T02D2535:17b-31: tshangs pa'i gzugs can gyis gsungs ba'o //
T02D2535:17b-32: don yod grub pa'i padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:17b-33: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan ni rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo //
T02D2535:17b-34: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang ni dzny'a na k'a ya'o //
T02D2535:18a-0: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang ni thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir dang po'i @18a * //
T02D2535:18a-2: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin ni bya ba
T02D2535:18a-3: nan tan gyis 'gro ba rnams mi gtong ba ste
T02D2535:18a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che ste sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo yin pas na /
T02D2535:18a-6: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ste zhi ba
T02D2535:18a-7: dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'khor
T02D2535:18a-8: lo sna tshogs 'chang ba rdo rje las so //
T02D2535:18a-9: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang ni sgrub pa'i
T02D2535:18a-10: brtson 'grus te phrin las thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2535:18a-12: so sor rtog pa skye ba med pa'i chos mkhyen
T02D2535:18a-13: nas 'gro ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba'i chos
T02D2535:18a-14: kun gyi ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'i gnod sbyin no
T02D2535:18a-15: // nan tan byed pa'i shes rab chen po skad
T02D2535:18a-16: cig la chos kun gyi 'od gsal ba thugs su
T02D2535:18a-18: dad pa'i dbang pos chos kun khong du chud pas thub pa'i blo mchog ste lcags kyu'o //
T02D2535:18a-19: brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos mi g-yo bas sangs rgyas
T02D2535:18a-20: kyi byang chub tu 'jug cing 'chang bas na zhags
T02D2535:18a-21: pa'o // dran pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du byed pas na lcags sgrog go //
T02D2535:18a-24: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
T02D2535:18a-25: kyis padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor badzra
T02D2535:18a-26: t'ikshna dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o /
T02D2535:18a-28: // / don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D2535:18a-29: du byas nas 'dod pa'i don grub ces bya ba
T02D2535:18a-31: 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub
T02D2535:18a-32: sgrub pa'i mchog tu gyur pas dam pa ste rnam
T02D2535:18a-34: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba ni rab tu
T02D2535:18a-35: byung ba'i cha byad can gyi chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2535:18a-36: bskor ba'i phyag rgya mnga' ba'o //
T02D2535:18a-37: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog ni thugs ka'i dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D2535:18a-38: sems can thams cad rab sgrol byed ni 'khor lo gnyis kyi steng du pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urti'o //
T02D2535:18a-39: don grub kyi mi bskyod pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D2535:18a-40: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba ste /
T02D2535:18a-41: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i g-yul gyi nang
T02D2535:18a-42: na rdo rje bsnams nas gcig pu dpa' pa nyon
T02D2535:18b-0: mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib @18b pa'i nga
T02D2535:18b-1: rgyal dang bcas pa dregs pas sa gnon gyi phyag
T02D2535:18b-2: mongs pa dang / rgyas 'joms pa'o // dpal ldan ni zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-3: blo ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D2535:18b-4: de las byung ba'i sgeg par ldan pa ni zhal khro 'dzum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-5: cung zad mche ba gtsigs shing bdud kyis mi bskyod
T02D2535:18b-6: pa brtan po'i khro bo mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang
T02D2535:18b-7: ba'o // rin chen gtsug phud kyi dbang du mdzad
T02D2535:18b-8: nas 'od zer gyis sprul pa'i lag pa brgya po
T02D2535:18b-9: kun du bskyod ni g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang gi
T02D2535:18b-10: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-11: dpal ldan ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor
T02D2535:18b-12: gyi ngo bo lag pa brgyas sprul pa'i phyag gis
T02D2535:18b-13: longs spyod pa ni nam mkha' khyab par sems can
T02D2535:18b-14: la dbang bskur nas gar byed pa ni ci dga'
T02D2535:18b-15: bar rol pa'o // rin chen ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2535:18b-16: dbang du mdzad nas yi ge lam yongs su gyur
T02D2535:18b-17: pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma'i lte bar
T02D2535:18b-18: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyis gnon cing zhabs g-yon
T02D2535:18b-19: pa'i rkang pa'i mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis bsam gtan
T02D2535:18b-20: dang po'i tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon pa
T02D2535:18b-21: ste phyag gnyis kyis padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-22: rin chen char 'bebs kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:18b-23: don gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2535:18b-24: don gcig ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D2535:18b-25: gnyis med ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-26: chos kyi don ni smon pa med pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-27: dam pa'i don ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2535:18b-28: 'jigs med ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2535:18b-29: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can ni me long lta bu'o //
T02D2535:18b-30: sems ni kun gzhi gnas 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2535:18b-31: rnam shes rgyud dang ldan ni yid kyi rnam par
T02D2535:18b-32: shes pa gnas gyur pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye
T02D2535:18b-33: shes so // dngos don ma lus ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D2535:18b-34: dga' ba ni rdo rje sems ma'o //
T02D2535:18b-35: stong pa nyid dga' ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02D2535:18b-36: 'dod chags blo ni rin chen ma'o //
T02D2535:18b-37: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa ni smon pa med pa ste chos ma'o //
T02D2535:18b-38: srid gsum dga' ba chen po ni 'od gsal ba ste las ma'o //
T02D2535:18b-39: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pas dkar mo'o //
T02D2535:19a-0: sku mdog ser mo yin yang @19a * //
T02D2535:19a-1: 'od zer ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'i rin chen sems ma'o //
T02D2535:19a-2: rgyal po bshad pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' bas na /
T02D2535:19a-3: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02D2535:19a-4: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar bas mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon pa'o //
T02D2535:19a-5: rin chen chags pa gsungs pa /
T02D2535:19a-6: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan bzang po aindra n'i la'i
T02D2535:19a-7: mdog can gyi zur phud kyi rtse mo can no
T02D2535:19a-9: skra mchog mthon ka'i rtse mo can //
T02D2535:19a-11: nor bu legs par bshad pa //
T02D2535:19a-12: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal te 'od zer kha dog lnga pa can dang /
T02D2535:19a-13: sprul pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can no //
T02D2535:19a-14: rin chen khro gnyer bshad pa zhabs g-yon brkyang nas 'jig rten gyi khams kun du bskyod cing /
T02D2535:19a-15: zhabs g-yas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis gzugs kyi khams gnon pa'o //
T02D2535:19a-17: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
T02D2535:19a-18: zhes bya ste lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang
T02D2535:19a-19: chos kyi dran pa 'chang bas dran pa chen po
T02D2535:19a-20: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'o
T02D2535:19a-22: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
T02D2535:19a-23: zhes bya ste dran pa dang chos rnam par 'byed
T02D2535:19a-24: pa dang brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang ting nge
T02D2535:19a-25: 'dzin shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms byang chub
T02D2535:19a-27: de rnams mnga' ba'i spos kyi dris de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho khyab pa'i byams pa'o //
T02D2535:19a-29: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig ste yang dag
T02D2535:19a-30: pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang ngag dang las
T02D2535:19a-31: dang 'tsho ba dang rtsol ba dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D2535:19a-32: dang dran pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag ste
T02D2535:19a-33: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi chos kyi
T02D2535:19a-34: sbyin pa'o // rin chen chos kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:19a-35: sems can kun la shas chen chags te byams pa'i
T02D2535:19a-36: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde bar mdzad pas na chags
T02D2535:19a-37: pa'o // nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyis ni chags pa'o //
T02D2535:19a-38: rin chen rnon po bshad pa //
T02D2535:19a-39: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / ces bya
T02D2535:19a-40: ste thugs rjes sems can la 'jug cing shes rab
T02D2535:19b-0: kyis sems can gyi nyon mongs @19b pa bcad nas
T02D2535:19b-1: yid ltar mgyogs pas na rnon po'o //
T02D2535:19b-3: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes te rdzu 'phrul
T02D2535:19b-4: gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can kun gyi don mkhyen
T02D2535:19b-5: pa'o // dga' ba'i stobs kyis sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pas 'khor lo'o //
T02D2535:19b-6: rin chen gsung ba bshad pa /
T02D2535:19b-7: phung po lnga don ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-8: de nyid shes pa ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-9: phung po lnga ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-10: rnam dag 'chang ba ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
T02D2535:19b-11: btang snyoms chen bo'i ljags bsnams pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-12: rin chen las ba shad pa 'bras bu'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:19b-13: nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
T02D2535:19b-15: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas ni theg pa
T02D2535:19b-16: gsum gyi rgyu la mkhas pa ste sna tshogs rdo
T02D2535:19b-17: rje bsnams pa'o // rin chen srung ba bshad pa /
T02D2535:19b-18: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
T02D2535:19b-19: zhes bya ste nges par 'byung ba theg pa gsum
T02D2535:19b-20: gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bsrung zhing gnas pa'i
T02D2535:19b-21: rgyu sems can la nges par 'byung ba kun ston
T02D2535:19b-22: ba ni 'bras bu ste go cha bsnams pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-23: rin chen gnod sbyin bshad pa /
T02D2535:19b-24: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
T02D2535:19b-26: lugs su 'byung ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-27: lugs las bzlog pa'i rnam par dag pa bcu gnyis 'chang bas na mche ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2535:19b-28: rin chen khu tshur bshad pa /
T02D2535:19b-29: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can te sdug bsngal
T02D2535:19b-30: dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi rnam
T02D2535:19b-31: pa nyid kyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa bzhi
T02D2535:19b-32: dang rjes su shes pa bzhi ste /
T02D2535:19b-33: brgyad kyi rtog pa gcig tu sdug cing khu tshur 'chang ba'o //
T02D2535:19b-34: bskal pa bzang po'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2535:19b-35: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
T02D2535:19b-36: zhes bya ste sdug bsngal shes /
T02D2535:19b-44: sdug bsngal shes par byar med /
T02D2535:20a-3: lam bsgom du med par yul du byas par 'chang ba ni byams pa'o //
T02D2535:20a-4: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig ni bden pa
T02D2535:20a-5: bzhi la shes bzod bcu drug rig pa'i 'jam dpal
T02D2535:20a-6: lo // rnam pa nyi shu byang chub pa ni
T02D2535:20a-7: bzod pa brgyad dang shes pa brgyad dang ye shes
T02D2535:20a-8: bzhi ste nyi shus byang chub pa ni spos kyi
T02D2535:20a-9: lo // glang po'o // rnam pa sangs rgyas kun
T02D2535:20a-10: gyi ye shes lnga rig nas mchog tu gyur pas
T02D2535:20a-11: na tog ste ye shes tog go //
T02D2535:20a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2535:20a-13: bye ba mtha' yas pa bzang po dpag tu med pa 'gyed cing skyong bas na bzang skyong ngo //
T02D2535:20a-14: skad cig ma thams cad kyi blos mngon par rtogs pas na blo gros rgya mtsho'o //
T02D2535:20a-15: sems 'od gsal ba'i skad cig ma'i don mi zad
T02D2535:20a-16: pa kun rig pas na blo gros mi zad pa'o
T02D2535:20a-17: // theg pa sna tshogs kyi thabs kyi tshul gyis
T02D2535:20a-18: spobs pa mnga' zhing 'gro ba'i mngon par mtho ba
T02D2535:20a-19: dang nges par legs pa'i don la rtog pas na
T02D2535:20a-20: brtsegs pa ste spobs pa brtsegs pa'o //
T02D2535:20a-21: khams gsum las theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung
T02D2535:20a-22: ba'i mthu chen po mnga' zhing theg pa gcig gi
T02D2535:20a-23: 'bras bur gnas pa'i mthu chen po brnyes pas na
T02D2535:20a-25: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag ni ngan song kun 'dren no //
T02D2535:20a-26: las kyi khams kyi mya ngan dang bral ba'i sdug
T02D2535:20a-27: bsngal zad par byed pas na mya ngan mun pa
T02D2535:20a-29: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi chu'i
T02D2535:20a-30: rgya mtsho kun las brgal pa'i ye shes kyi dra
T02D2535:20a-31: ba mnga' bas dra ba can gyi 'od do //
T02D2535:20a-32: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba ni gnyen po'i
T02D2535:20a-33: rnal 'byor zla ba chos pa lta bu 'gro ba
T02D2535:20a-34: kun 'khor ba'i dgon pa las dbyung nas ye shes
T02D2535:20a-35: kyi lang tsho bskyod pas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o
T02D2535:20a-36: // 'od dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2535:20a-37: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pas na 'od dpag tu med do //
T02D2535:20a-38: snying rje chen po dang shes rab kyi thabs nam
T02D2535:20a-39: mkha' lta bu skye gnas las dngos grub gsum don
T02D2535:20a-40: yod par mdzad bas na nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2535:20b-0: bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i sgrib pa'i 'du @20b
T02D2535:20b-1: shes kyi don spangs shed rnam par shis pa'i don
T02D2535:20b-2: gyi gzugs 'dzin sel cing 'gog par byed pas na
T02D2535:20b-3: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
T02D2535:20b-4: lha mo brgyad kyi dbang du mdzad nas /

T02D2535:20b-6: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan te rin chen sgeg mo'o //
T02D2535:20b-7: phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pas
T02D2535:20b-8: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rig cing dgyes pa ste phreng
T02D2535:20b-9: ma'o // rin po che'i pi wang brdung ba'i gzhu
T02D2535:20b-10: bsnams pas na sems can kun gyi yid la gnas

T02D2535:20b-16: na rin chen bdug pa ma'o //
T02D2535:20b-17: rin po che'i me tog gi za ma tog bsnams
T02D2535:20b-18: pas na sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba ste
T02D2535:20b-19: me tog ma'o // mar me'i mchod sdong bsnams nas
T02D2535:20b-20: 'khrul pa'i mun pa sel bas na mar me ma'o
T02D2535:20b-21: me tog ma'o // // dri'i dung chos bsnams nas
T02D2535:20b-22: gzugs 'dzin gyi nor pa thams cad spong bas na
T02D2535:20b-23: me tog ma'o // // dri chab ma'o // bde
T02D2535:20b-24: ba dang sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms kyi don la
T02D2535:20b-25: the tshom med cing shes bya kun gyi don la
T02D2535:20b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid bsnyems
T02D2535:20b-27: pas rin chen lcags kyu ma'o //
T02D2535:20b-28: phung po lnga dang dus gsum du chos kyi dbyings
T02D2535:20b-29: skad cig thams cad la don dam par bye brag
T02D2535:20b-30: phyed pa ste zhags pa ma'o //
T02D2535:20b-31: skad cig ma gcig gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran

T02D2535:20b-33: rang bzhin bdag gi lus la 'chang bas na rin
T02D2535:20b-35: lus med lus te sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs so //
T02D2535:20b-36: lus kyi mchog ste gsung rnams so //
T02D2535:20b-37: lus kyi mtha' ni rten yin pas na sku ste /

T02D2535:20b-39: thams cad kyi sku mdog dang rgyan dang phyag mtshan ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2535:20b-40: gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston te dbyibs dum can no //
T02D2535:20b-41: nor bu chen po ni kun gyi kha dog ser po'o //
T02D2535:20b-42: rin chen tog ni phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2535:21a-0: cod pan la rin po che'i tog @21a * //
T02D2535:21a-2: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis
T02D2535:21a-3: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los
T02D2535:21a-4: sgyur ba don thams cad grub pa ni w'a g'i

T02D2535:21a-18: cing bskyed pa'o // de sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
